form.name: asymmetrical_limb_movement
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Other Serious Conditions, Birth Injury & Abnormalities> Asymmetrical Limb Movement

field.name: Refer mother and baby to a health center or hospital
Gently handle limb that is not moving
If baby can feed and not vomiting, help mother to breastfeed
If baby is not able to breastfeed, give small sips of expressed breast milk that has been collected in a clean container with a lid
Advise mother to gently handle baby and the limb that is not moving
Teach mother how to keep the baby warm on the way to the health facility
Record baby’s clinical information in client’s maternal health or “Red” book. If possible, also fill out referral form
Accompany mother and baby, and have a family member accompany mother and baby to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
